commit.message:
Move some `unreadable_literal` ui tests to correct file

The moved tests were part of `tests/ui/literals.rs` before. Now they are
placed in `tests/ui/unreadable_literal.rs`, which now also runs
`rustfix` on these 4 extra let statements.

verification.payload:
tree f53bfe39ce72fc51b9615819937223ff1671d28a
parent 92612c9de159889f77f05855a77482ee1d895f51
author Philipp Hansch <dev@phansch.net> 1552632631 +0100
committer Philipp Hansch <dev@phansch.net> 1552974942 +0100

Move some `unreadable_literal` ui tests to correct file

The moved tests were part of `tests/ui/literals.rs` before. Now they are
placed in `tests/ui/unreadable_literal.rs`, which now also runs
`rustfix` on these 4 extra let statements.

@@ -86,133 +86,107 @@ help: if you mean to use an octal constant, use `0o`
